_header: Lord God maker of all thing
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A simple prayer to Christ — one quatrain

BLRoy18Bxxiii.Transcription:
lorde god makere of all þingehaue mercy on vs iff it be þi
                    willas þu arte forme of man & a kynge& borne of a clene
                    mayde so meke & still
BLRoy18Bxxiii.Editions:
Ross,  W. O.,
                        ed.  
             Middle English Sermons from British Museum MS. Royal 18 B.
                xxiii.
